statements: DELETE FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';

DELETE FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_date < '2022-01-01' AND maintenance_description LIKE '%oil%';

DELETE FROM maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
DELETE FROM maintenance_records WHERE vehicle_id = 1 AND maintenance_date < '2021-01-01';
